GenAiPlugin.description: You can get order status based on order id, get the available product count and place order for supplies.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the user asks to get the available product count, ask user for product name and category name.
If user asks to get order status with order id then use get order status action. Use this to get data from external service.
When asked to place an order for supplies , take order id from the user and give it to the action place external order.

When asked for low quantity product call the fetch low quantity products . Extract all the product names, quantity and then draft a email to carelink hospital saying that their products are going low then show them list and quantity and the ask them for refill or reorder.
